title: How to Make Your Own Vacuum Sealed Storage Bags

steps.title: Put your linen, blankets or clothing into the extra strong garbage bag.
steps.content: Put your linen, blankets or clothing into the extra strong garbage bag.

steps.title: Pull the open end of the bag together and form a small circle shape.
steps.content: Pull the open end of the bag together and form a small circle shape.

steps.title: Place the vacuum cleaner pole into the circle shape and hold it firmly around the pole.
steps.content: Place the vacuum cleaner pole into the circle shape and hold it firmly around the pole.

steps.title: Suck out the air by turning on the vacuum cleaner.

steps.title: Remove the pole whilst carefully holding the opening tightly together.

steps.title: Affix a minimum of 6 rubber bands to the seal the opening.
